function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation systems in buildings","Impact":"Increased risk of aerosol transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implementation of floor-level air returns and proper ventilation design","Technologies":"Advanced ventilation systems with directed air flow","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and employees","Owner":"Architects, building designers, and facility managers"},{"Description":"Lack of compartmentalization in building design","Impact":"Higher probability of disease spreading throughout the building","Mitigation":"Implementation of compartmentalized spaces and barriers","Technologies":"Modular partition systems and flexible space design","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and employees","Owner":"Architects, building designers, and facility managers"},{"Description":"Underestimation of future pandemic risks in architectural design","Impact":"Vulnerability to future pandemics and inability to respond effectively","Mitigation":"Incorporation of pandemic-resilient design principles into architectural planning","Technologies":"Smart building technologies, sensor systems for disease detection","People":"Architects, urban planners, and building developers","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, and building developers"}]}
